function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long-term reliance on PPE, especially face masks, may lead to complacency and reduced compliance over time, increasing the risk of disease spread","Impact":"Increased likelihood of disease transmission and outbreaks due to decreased adherence to PPE usage","Mitigation":"Continuous education and reinforcement of the importance of PPE usage, development of comfortable and effective PPE, and regular monitoring and enforcement of PPE guidelines","Technologies":"Advanced PPE materials, wearable technology to monitor PPE usage, and education platforms","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and individuals in high-risk environments","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers, and PPE manufacturers"},{"Description":"Insufficient testing and approval of medical inventions for disease prevention may lead to ineffective or unsafe products being used in the market","Impact":"Increased risk of harm or ineffective disease control measures, undermining public health efforts","Mitigation":"Rigorous scientific testing, adherence to regulatory approval processes, and transparent communication of testing results","Technologies":"Advanced testing methods, data analysis tools, and regulatory approval platforms","People":"Consumers, healthcare providers, and regulatory agencies","Owner":"Medical research institutions, regulatory agencies, and manufacturers"}]}
